description: Senators enable the prosecution of the ex-interior minister for blocking a migrant ship's entry.
title: Italy's Salvini to face new trial over migrant ship blockade
title_page: Italy's Salvini to face new trial over migrant ship blockade - BBC News
maintext: Coronavirus restrictions have prevented Mr Salvini holding rallies up and down the country or posing for selfies on the beach - campaign tactics which have endeared him to many Italians. His popularity is driven by prolific use of social media, in which he condemns the influx of migrants from North Africa.
